summary: Checco is born on the privileged side of life in an Italian small town, with a guaranteed job as a public servant. When a new reformist government vows to cut down on bureaucracy, Checco is forced to accept worsening conditions.
cast: Checco Zalone|Eleonora Giovanardi|Sonia Bergamasco|Maurizio Micheli|Ludovica Modugno|Antonino Bruschetta|Pippo Crotti|Paolo Pierobon|Giuseppe Ansaldi|Henrik Braekhus|Giustina Buonomo|Fabio Casale|Nicola Ciccariello|Emmanuel Dabone|Giovanni D'Addario|Francesco de Cuzzani|Elisabeth Grøtte Kolstad|Mohamed Ibrahim|Inger Kenubish|Federico Ielapi|Adam Nour Marino|Azzurra Martino|James McKenna|Massimiliano Montgomery|Luciano Montrone|Nabil|Angela Napa|Michele Napoletano|Kristine M. Opheim|Harald O. Nødtvedt|Giuseppe Piarulli|Lilia Pierno|Vincenzo Pirrotta|Jo Christian Rand|Rufin Doh Zeyenouin|Karin Stautland|Lise Kristine Sunnanaa|Geirr Tveitt|Silvio Vannucci|Manuela Ventura|Diego Verdegiglio|Lino Banfi|Francesco Cassano|Stefano Grillo|Adam Kay Nixon
title: Un italiano en Noruega
